author: Yudaraa Morayes
text:
Ok now if this is true what a joke is this???!🤢🤮 So millions of people voted for him and now his only goal is to pursue black magic, ensuring that he and his family are safe?
#GoHomeGota https://t.co/qvamjAwS2n

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: I hope I'll survive this year as well 🙄🙌

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Because always remember, in the end, we all want a happy ending, not an ending full of terror 🙌

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Imagine being harassed by hundreds of extremists around you. Think for a moment, the helplessness you may feel, the feeling that you will die somehow. Isn't that a nightmare? That is why "humanity" should be practised and believed more than religion!!!

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Some future children will be dissatisfied with their natural beauty cause their parents are extraordinarily gorgeous.😤

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Some people realize their failure but can lie without any shame - for example, SL politicians!!!

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Now I can't even think of being as productive as I was 2 years ago!!!🤷‍♀️

author: Yudaraa Morayes
text: Stop asking what my religion is, I believe in "humanity" 🙏
